name: HematopoieticStemCellTransplantProcedures
title: Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplant Procedures
description: This value set has not been tested in a clinical environment. Please use with caution.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Hematopoietic stem cell transplant (HSCT) procedures),(Data Element Scope: ICD10 PCS and HCPS HSCT procedure codes),(Inclusion Criteria: HSCT procedure codes. This include transfusion of stem cells, cord blood, bone marrow of varied origins (e.g., allogeneic).),(Exclusion Criteria: Non-HSCT procedures)
